text:
did not disparage or cast judgment or say anything snarky like, "This is the way we should always be." I feel like we had a moment, if even just a single
moment to be like we were on June 30th. I'm just as sorry for my behavior in the past, just as sober as I was then, and just as committed to helping us
all heal for the next chapter. It just looks different in 2024 than 2023. Can we perhaps chat at your convivence? I want to be sure I am working with
you in a way you feel is healthy for us all and am always open to feedback.
